thread.title: Former United star Chicharito whiffs on an open goal (video)
thread.title_full: Former United star Chicharito whiffs on an open goal (video)

author: paulmbanks
title: Former United star Chicharito whiffs on an open goal (video)
text:
Tweet 
It was an up and down night for former Manchester United striker Javier “Chicharito” Hernandez in a very gripping CONCACAF Cup playoff. His national side, Mexico, defeated the United States 3-2 at the Rose Bowl in Pasadena, California. El Tri vs USA has become an overheated rivalry lately and the result leveled a huge blow to American 2016 Olympic hopes. 
So first and foremost, Hernandez accomplished the more important team goals. 
On an individual level, Chicharito scored his ever goal versus the United States Men’s National Team. 
Here’s the footage: 
— SB Nation Soccer (@SBNationSoccer) October 11, 2015 
That was the good. Here’s the bad. Chicharito later completely whiffed on an open goal from only four yards out. 
Take a look: 
— FOX Soccer (@FOXSoccer) October 11, 2015 
It was a big night for Chicharito, as he experienced many positives and negatives.
